testcase.classname: To validate Login functionality in Facebook Application.
testcase.name: To validate login with different credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User is in facebook login page........................................passed When User enter invalid username and password...............................passed And User click Login button.................................................passed Then User should be in invalid credential page..............................passed

testcase.classname: To validate Login functionality in Facebook Application.
testcase.name: To validate searching the account using mobile when user forgot the password
testcase.system-out: Given User is in facebook login page........................................passed Given User navigate to facebook login page..................................passed When User clicks forgotten password link....................................passed And User seaches the account using invalid mobilenumber"5488795632213222"..passed Then User is displayed with error message...................................passed
